response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $15,000 to you. This is an excellent chance to secure a remarkable asset at a significant discount. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know at your earliest convenience.
